1.name: Scarface
1.description: In Miami in 1980, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

2.name: The Outsiders
2.description: The rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, only heats up when one gang member kills a member of the other.

3.name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
3.description: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

4.name: Jaws 3-D
4.description: The sons of police chief Brody must protect customers at a SeaWorld theme park after a thirty-five-foot shark becomes trapped in the park with them.

5.name: National Lampoon's Vacation
5.description: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.

6.name: Risky Business
6.description: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.

7.name: Flashdance
7.description: A Pittsburgh woman with two jobs as a welder and an exotic dancer wants to get into ballet school.

8.name: Private School
8.description: Christine (Phoebe Cates), a student at an exclusive all-girls private school, is in love with Jim, who attends an academy for boys nearby. Christine's arch rival Jordan also has her eye on ...                See full summary »

9.name: WarGames
9.description: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

10.name: Christine
10.description: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

11.name: Videodrome
11.description: When he acquires a different kind of show for his station, a sleazy cable-TV programmer begins to see his life and the future of media spin out of control in a terrifying new reality.

12.name: Sleepaway Camp
12.description: Angela Baker, a traumatized and very shy young girl, is sent to summer camp with her cousin. Shortly after her arrival, anyone with sinister or less than honorable intentions gets their comeuppance.

13.name: Octopussy
13.description: A fake Fabergé egg, and a fellow Agent's death, lead James Bond to uncover an international jewel-smuggling operation, headed by the mysterious Octopussy, being used to disguise a nuclear attack on N.A.T.O. forces.

14.name: The Right Stuff
14.description: The story of the original Mercury 7 astronauts and their macho, seat-of-the-pants approach to the space program.

15.name: Never Say Never Again
15.description: A S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.

16.name: The Big Chill
16.description: A group of seven former college friends gather for a week-end reunion at a South Carolina vacation home after the funeral of another of their college friends.

17.name: Krull
17.description: A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet.

18.name: Bad Boys
18.description: Chicago crime kid Mick O'Brien is sent to reform school after accidentally killing a rival's kid brother.

19.name: Terms of Endearment
19.description: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love, and her daughter's family problems.

20.name: Cujo
20.description: Cujo, a friendly St. Bernard, contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

21.name: Trading Places
21.description: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

22.name: Mr. Mom
22.description: After he's laid off, a husband switches roles with his wife. She returns to the workforce, and he becomes a stay-at-home dad, a job he has no clue how to do.

23.name: Superman III
23.description: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

24.name: A Christmas Story
24.description: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher and Santa that a Red Ryder BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

25.name: Twilight Zone: The Movie
25.description: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from Rod Serling's landmark television series.

26.name: Spring Break
26.description: Two sets of two college guys spend a spring break together in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. There they have lots of fun in and out of the sun.

27.name: Brainstorm
27.description: Researchers develop a system where they can jump into people's minds. But when people involved bring their personal problems into the equation, it becomes dangerous - perhaps deadly.

28.name: Silkwood
28.description: A worker at a plutonium processing plant is purposefully contaminated, psychologically tortured and possibly murdered to prevent her from exposing worker safety violations at the plant.

29.name: The Dead Zone
29.description: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.

30.name: Valley Girl
30.description: Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her trendy, shallow friends.

31.name: The Meaning of Life
31.description: The comedy team takes a look at life in all its stages in their own uniquely silly way.

32.name: Rumble Fish
32.description: Rusty James, an absent-minded street thug struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days when gang warfare was going on.

33.name: My Tutor
33.description: A rich father hires a tutor for his son. The son is a horny teenager and the tutor is a gorgeous blonde. Complications ensue.

34.name: Local Hero
34.description: An American oil company sends a man to Scotland to buy up an entire village where they want to build a refinery. But things don't go as expected.

35.name: Stroker Ace
35.description: The title character, a popular NASCAR driver, clashes with the fried-chicken mogul that sponsors his racing team.

36.name: Blue Thunder
36.description: The cop test pilot for an experimental police helicopter learns the sinister implications of the new vehicle.

37.name: All the Right Moves
37.description: A high school football player desperate for a scholarship and his headstrong coach clash in a dying Pennsylvania steel town.

38.name: Psycho II
38.description: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude, but the specters of his crimes - and his mother - continue to haunt him.

39.name: Nostalgia
39.description: A Russian poet and his interpreter travel to Italy to research the life of an 18th-century composer.

40.name: Sudden Impact
40.description: A rape victim is exacting revenge on her aggressors in a small town outside San Francisco. "Dirty" Harry Callahan, on suspension for angering his superiors (again), is assigned to the case.

41.name: Losin' It
41.description: Set in 1965, four rowdy teenage guys travel to Tijuana, Mexico for a night of partying when they are joined by a heartbroken housewife who is in town seeking a quick divorce.

42.name: The Hunger
42.description: A love triangle develops between a beautiful yet dangerous vampire, her cellist companion, and a gerontologist.

43.name: D.C. Cab
43.description: The tale of a hapless group of cabbies and a rundown cab company owned by Harold. Albert comes to town with a dream of starting his own cab company but needs to motivate Harold's employees ...                See full summary »

44.name: The House on Sorority Row
44.description: After a seemingly innocent prank goes horribly wrong, a group of sorority sisters are stalked and murdered one by one in their sorority house while throwing a party to celebrate their graduation.

45.name: Class
45.description: A young man in private school spends one crazy night out, but soon realizes the woman he hooked up with is not who he expected.

46.name: Deathstalker
46.description: The warrior Deathstalker is tasked by an old witch to obtain and unite the three powers of creation - a chalice, an amulet, and a sword - lest the evil magician Munkar get them and use them...                See full summary »

47.name: Eddie and the Cruisers
47.description: A television newswoman picks up the story of a 1960s rock band whose long-lost leader - Eddie Wilson - may still be alive, while searching for the missing tapes of the band's never-released album.

48.name: Staying Alive
48.description: It's five years later and Tony Manero's Saturday Night Fever is still burning. Now he's strutting toward his biggest challenge yet - succeeding as a dancer on the Broadway stage.

49.name: The Survivors
49.description: Having both lost their jobs, two strangers become unlikely friends after a run in with a would be robber, who is actually a hitman with a grudge against the two.

50.name: Easy Money
50.description: To inherit his mother-in-law's colossal fortune, a hard-living gambling addict must change his unhealthy ways before they get the best of him.
